nodes.text: Marialew was a human female freighter pilot. She transported junk from Starkiller Base to the Garbage Moon of Maher for the First Order. The stormtrooper FN-2187 got himself assigned to escort the garbage to its destination so that he could smuggle native creatures to a safer place. Marialew caught onto what FN-2187 was attempting to do, but helped him, as she had encountered several similar creatures before, giving them a habitat on the junk moon.
